title: BlowOut Bedding Multiple Sizes & Colors - Down Alternative Reversible Black/Red Comforter - Twin/Twin XL
features: Luxurious GOOSE DOWN Comforter Provides Medium Warmth For Year Round Comfort
Filling with 750+ Fill Power, 70 oz Fill Weight, 100% Goose Down REVERSIBLE comforter
Machine Wash in Cold/Warm Water, Delicate Cycle with Mild Detergent, No Bleach, Tumble Dry on Low, Remove Immediately at end of Cycle
description: Wrap yourself in these luxurious 300 Thread Count 100% Egyptian Cotton GOOSE DOWN REVERSIBLE Comforters that are truly worthy of a classy elegant suite, and are found in world class hotels. Woven to a luxurious 300 threads per square inch, these fine Luxury Bed Comforters are crafted from Long Staple Egyptian Cotton. Comfort, quality and opulence set our Luxury Bedding in a class above the rest. The result is a comforter so luxurious and soft, you will believe you are truly covering with a cloud, night after night. You will relax and enjoy the rich, soft and luxurious feeling of these Egyptian cotton cover REVERSIBLE comforter. Package contains 1 GOOSE DOWN REVERSIBLE Comforter.
